msContents.summary: letter to a cleric, perhaps from a layman to be readmitted to comunion. The same text is copied on the back

msItem.note: incomplete on the right side; 19 lines on front and 21 on back;
copy on the back with dialectal variations and in worse condition

2 copies of the same text written by two different hands; nice literary hand on the front, perhaps a model, with right margin of 1 cm.; sloppier, more faded hand on the back with smudged ink and stains
msItem.textLang: in Coptic with some forms on the front replaced by dialect forms on the back

supportDesc.support: 1 incomplete ostracon ; ribbed clay, written on both sides ; 19.5 x 13 cm

provenance.p: from Thebes, Monastery of Epiphanius. Gift of H.E. Winlock in 1924 to the Metropolitan Museum, MMA inv. 24.6.4. Sold to Columbia University in 1958
